name: Ga-Ga and Nae-Nae Chocolate Chip Cookies
author: Charlotte Hooper
instructions: Heat oven to 350Â°. Mix thoroughly shortening, butter, sugars, eggs and vanilla. Blend in salt, baking soda and 3 cups flour. Touch dough with finger tip (if it sticks) add remaining 1/4 cup, a little at a time. Place 2 ounce balls (red ball scoop tool) 2 inches apart onto ungreased baking sheet. Bake 8 to 10 minutes or until light brown. Cool slightly before removing from baking sheet.
